mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD ( TITLE, CONTENTS, HIT_CNT, DEL_GB, CREA_DTM, CREA_ID ) VALUES ( #{TITLE}, #{CONTENTS}, 0, 'N', NOW(), #{CREA_ID} )
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, TITLE, CONTENTS, HIT_CNT, DATE_FORMAT(CREA_DTM,'%Y-%m-%d') AS CREA_DTM, CREA_ID FROM TB_BOARD WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' ORDER BY IDX DESC
